jd_information.description: Dear Candidate!! URGENT HIRING FOR TRAVEL PROCESS IN GURGAON LOCATION. PROCESS:  TRAVEL PROCESS LOCATION: GURGAONSALARY : Upto 35 k ctc + huge incentivesSHIFT : rotational shift with 5 days workingEXPERIENCE : Fresher/Experienced both can applyBoth side cab facility JOB DESCRIPTION Handle customers mainly for International Flights bookings. . Good Geographical Knowledge i.e. City codes, Airport codes etc. Excellent Knowledge of Amadeus/GDS. Excellent Communication skills. Good stability background. Good Written English skills. * Immediate Joining Required **UNDERGRADUATE / GRADUATE EXPERIENCE CAN APPLY** INTERESTED CANDIDATE CAN CALL @ HR manisha: 9990582211HR konika: 9555666145OR CAN EMAIL THEIR RESUME @ shalini.verma@alexoworld.co.incv.alexoworld@gmail.com**anyone can refer their friends also*
